Html:
Version
Config Transformation Tool, Version=1.4.4802.22262, http://ctt.codeplex.com by OutcoldSolutions, http://outcoldman.com, 2013

Here are files:
TEXT

After transformation result format does not match transformation format.

command line (notice pw is there):
ctt pw verbose s:src.txt t:transform.txt d:dst.txt

Am I doing something wrong?

There are so many xml readers / writers and each of them is trying to change xml source how it wants. adbre suggested one more workaround for this add support for indenting output. This pull request was merged and I already built new version with support of indenting: https://ctt.codeplex.com/releases/view/106225. Just download new version and add one more parameter "i" to the command line "ctt i pw verbose s:src.txt t:transform.txt d:dst.txt "
